description: Perform various operations on a Data object.

operations.info: List of operations to perform on the data.

select_keys_input.info: List of keys to select from the data. Only top-level keys can be selected.

filter_key.info: Name of the key containing the list to filter. It must be a top-level key in the JSON and its value must be a list.

operator.info: The operator to apply for comparing the values.

filter_values.info: List of values to filter by.

append_update_data.info: Data to append or update the existing data with. Only top-level keys are checked.

remove_keys_input.info: List of keys to remove from the data.

rename_keys_input.info: List of keys to rename in the data.

mapped_json_display.info: Paste or preview your JSON here to explore its structure and select a path for extraction.

query.info: JSON Query to filter the data. Used by Parse JSON operation.

success.data_updated: Successfully updated data with {count} new fields

warnings.missing_filter_params: Filter key or value is missing.
warnings.items_missing_key: Warning: {count} items don't have the key '{key}' or are not dictionaries.

errors.empty_jq_query: JSON Query is required and cannot be blank.
errors.jq_null_result: JSON query returned null/None. Check if the path exists in your data.
errors.multiple_data_not_supported: {operation} operation is not supported for multiple data objects.
errors.incompatible_operations: {operations} operations are not supported in combination with each other.
errors.select_key_not_found: Select key not found in data. Available keys: {available_keys}
errors.combine_requires_multiple: Combine operation requires multiple data inputs.
errors.filter_key_not_found: Filter key '{key}' not found in data. Available keys: {available_keys}
errors.filter_key_not_list: Filter key '{key}' is not a list.
errors.append_update_failed: Failed to append or update data: {error}
errors.missing_data_or_key: Missing input data or selected key.
